mapper.select: select * from recipe where type = #{type} limit ${start}, ${viewRow}
select count(*) as tot from recipe where TYPE = #{type}
select *, DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD,'%X-%m-%d') as UPLOAD2 from board where TYPE = #{type} and DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY NO DESC limit ${start}, ${viewRow}
select count(*) as tot from board where TYPE = #{type} and DEL_YN='N'
select *,DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD, '%X-%m-%d') as UPLOAD from REVIEW where RECOMMEND < 20 limit ${start}, ${viewRow}
select count(*) as tot from REVIEW where RECOMMEND < 20
select *,DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD, '%X-%m-%d') as UPLOAD from REVIEW where RECOMMEND >= 20 limit ${start}, ${viewRow}
select count(*) as tot from REVIEW where RECOMMEND >= 20
select *, DATE_FORMAT(UPLOAD, '%X-%m-%d') as UPLOAD2 from board where NO = #{NO}
mapper.insert: insert into board (TYPE, TITLE, NAME, ID, PASSWD, UPLOAD, CONT) values (#{TYPE},#{TITLE},#{NAME},#{ID},#{PASSWD}, now(),#{CONT})
mapper.update: update board set DEL_YN = 'D' where NO = #{NO}
mapper.insert: insert into NAVERLOGIN (access_token, EMAIL, NAME, NICKNAME, AGE) values (#{access_token}, #{EMAIL},#{NAME},#{NICKNAME},#{AGE})
mapper.update: update board set TITLE=#{TITLE}, NAME=#{NAME},CONT=#{CONT},UPLOAD=now() where NO = #{NO}
mapper.select: select * from Manager where ID = #{ID} and PW = #{PW}
